items.sentence: You ought to tell Tom that you aren't planning on staying very long.
As food and drink is to animals, so are rain and sunshine to plants.
This is one of the best Chinese restaurants that I've ever eaten at.
After Tom started studying grammar, his French improved quite a bit.
Even though I'm better at French, I really want to speak in English.
Our house is the only one in this area that survived the earthquake.
That teacher sometimes hits his students, but nobody ever complains.
When the heater in the barn fails, you get milk-flavoured ice cubes.
Would it be OK with you if we continued this conversation in French?
Whenever I go out, my parents keep texting me to make sure I'm okay.
Tom was stupid enough to go out with Mary, even though he hated her.
I could tell by the look on Tom's face that he didn't like the idea.
The female student that sat in front of the teacher is from Germany.
Mary wasn't the only girl who said she was interested in doing that.
Tom was convinced that the food he had just eaten had been poisoned.
How much would it cost to send this package by airmail to Australia?
On a day like this, you should definitely wear a hat and sunglasses.
You always wear a ponytail. Why not try pigtails every now and then?
I'll have finished reading this novel by the time you come tomorrow.
The human race has one really effective weapon and that is laughter.
